comment.body: I don't know this guy, but that's what totalitarian regimes do.

Ok, I watched part of the video. I have to say it is not my thing. A bit too much conspiracy theories. But I'm all for free speech. I wouldn't classify this as hate speech. They use rude language, but don't call for anything nasty. Whoever wants to watch this should be able to.
Switzerland's independence from the EU has many benefits. But oftentimes the shit that they make up also affects us.
